name: grimstroke_spawn_04
text: At last the full majesty of my design...
text_simple: at last the full majesty of my design

name: grimstroke_spawn_05
text: Long have my people suffered...for my ambitions.
text_simple: long have my people suffered for my ambitions

name: grimstroke_spawn_06
text: Set in ink...as were it stone.
text_simple: set in ink as were it stone

name: grimstroke_spawn_07
text: My kin grow restless. Today we shackle more to join them.
text_simple: my kin grow restless today we shackle more to join them

name: grimstroke_spawn_08
text: The strokes of my brush mark your fate.
text_simple: the strokes of my brush mark your fate

name: grimstroke_spawn_09
text: I alone hold back the inktide.
text_simple: i alone hold back the inktide

name: grimstroke_spawn_10
text: In the face of what I've become, what are you?
text_simple: in the face of what ive become what are you

name: grimstroke_spawn_11
text: I'll paint this world as I see fit.
text_simple: ill paint this world as i see fit

name: grimstroke_spawn_12
text: What dark mural comes to life today?
text_simple: what dark mural comes to life today

name: grimstroke_spawn_13
text: The battlefield is merely a canvas, waiting for my brush.
text_simple: the battlefield is merely a canvas waiting for my brush

name: grimstroke_spawn_14
text: These wretched fools have no idea...
text_simple: these wretched fools have no idea
pretty_criteria: Spawning|Spawning in the loadout|A gold hero chat wheel was used

name: grimstroke_spawn_15
text: When all hope has gone... I remain.
text_simple: when all hope has gone i remain

name: grimstroke_rare_01_03
text: It was long past time... when I returned to Ashkavor...
text_simple: it was long past time when i returned to ashkavor

name: grimstroke_rare_02_02
text: Only once I'd grown strong enough, and the revenants could harm me no more...
text_simple: only once id grown strong enough and the revenants could harm me no more

name: grimstroke_rare_03
text: In the first days, they'd hounded me. Driven me away. I had no control.
text_simple: in the first days theyd hounded me driven me away i had no control

name: grimstroke_rare_04_02
text: But in time, mastery came to me. Just as it always had.
text_simple: but in time mastery came to me just as it always had

name: grimstroke_rare_05_02
text: My city... The temple around the runestone... It was exactly as I'd left it. Still, lifeless... A sculpture of the end of days.
text_simple: my city the temple around the runestone it was exactly as id left it still lifeless a sculpture of the end of days

name: grimstroke_rare_06_02
text: Just the first dark mural brought to life by the tip of my brush.
text_simple: just the first dark mural brought to life by the tip of my brush

name: grimstroke_rare_07_02
text: How the spirits wailed at my arrival!
text_simple: how the spirits wailed at my arrival

name: grimstroke_rare_08_02
text: Staring into those faces, once so dear to me... Did I feel sorrow?
text_simple: staring into those faces once so dear to me did i feel sorrow

name: grimstroke_rare_09_02
text: You know as well as I.... My people invited this fate upon themselves.
text_simple: you know as well as i my people invited this fate upon themselves

name: grimstroke_rare_10
text: I'm not the last of my people. Those who ascended before me still remain.
text_simple: im not the last of my people those who ascended before me still remain

name: grimstroke_rare_11_02
text: The ascended ones shrink from me. They still hope our people can be saved.
text_simple: the ascended ones shrink from me they still hope our people can be saved

name: grimstroke_rare_12
text: The power of the ascended ones was warped by my transformation. They live...barely.
text_simple: the power of the ascended ones was warped by my transformation they live barely

name: grimstroke_rare_13
text: With the power of the Ancients in hand, the last remnants of my kind will learn: there's nowhere left to hide.
text_simple: with the power of the ancients in hand the last remnants of my kind will learn theres nowhere left to hide

name: grimstroke_rare_14_02
text: The hollow spaces I feel inside will at last be made whole.
text_simple: the hollow spaces i feel inside will at last be made whole

name: grimstroke_battlebegins_01
text: My time comes. Theirs comes to an end.
text_simple: my time comes theirs comes to an end

name: grimstroke_battlebegins_02
text: This world will never be the same!
text_simple: this world will never be the same

text: The portrait of this battle will be painted in blood!
text_simple: the portrait of this battle will be painted in blood

text: Toast the first droplets! And the torrents to come!

name: grimstroke_firstblood_04

text_simple: you failed to see the true power of the family avernus

text_simple: the morning mist will rise from your grave

name: grimstroke_rival_04

name: grimstroke_rival_05
text: They say you always were. Now, you'll never be again.

name: grimstroke_rival_06
text: This is how your pathetic struggle ends, Anti-Mage.
text_simple: this is how your pathetic struggle ends antimage

name: grimstroke_rival_07
text: You die as you lived, Anti-Mage. For nothing.
text_simple: you die as you lived antimage for nothing

name: grimstroke_rival_08
text: This was the great gaoler of the Ancients? This war should be easy to win.
text_simple: this was the great gaoler of the ancients this war should be easy to win

name: grimstroke_rival_09
text: You come unbound, Warden. I merely finish what was already started.

name: grimstroke_rival_10
text: I've no time for barely literate imbeciles.
text_simple: ive no time for barely literate imbeciles

name: grimstroke_rival_11
text: From the source of such power, I expected...more.
text_simple: from the source of such power i expected more

name: grimstroke_rival_12
text: I should take your corpse with me. Shame to let such potent ingredients go to waste.
text_simple: i should take your corpse with me shame to let such potent ingredients go to waste

name: grimstroke_rival_13
text: Your napalm is nothing compared to my ink!
text_simple: your napalm is nothing compared to my ink

name: grimstroke_rival_14
text: What can you expect from one who lays with beasts?
text_simple: what can you expect from one who lays with beasts

name: grimstroke_rival_15
text: In the end, what you sought was your own demise...
text_simple: in the end what you sought was your own demise

name: grimstroke_rival_16
text: You went through all this trouble to find me. The least I could do was watch you die.
text_simple: you went through all this trouble to find me the least i could do was watch you die

name: grimstroke_rival_17
text: If only you'd turned your attention from your barrel to the fight at hand.
text_simple: if only youd turned your attention from your barrel to the fight at hand

name: grimstroke_rival_18
text: A working class hero is nothing to me.

name: grimstroke_rival_19
text: How did one as dim as you even survive childhood?

name: grimstroke_rival_23

text_simple: now you submit to my cause chen

text_simple: i take no pleasure in destroying maraxiforms greatest work of art

text: I would have preferred to let your suffering continue.
text_simple: i would have preferred to let your suffering continue

name: grimstroke_rival_26

text_simple: not even the metallurgic arts can stop the strokes of my brush

name: grimstroke_rival_27
text: Your grave will be even colder, my dear.
text_simple: your grave will be even colder my dear

name: grimstroke_rival_28

text_simple: i had hoped to sway you to my cause maiden but your naivet left me no choice

text: I thought you'd survive longer than that...

name: grimstroke_rival_32

text: Your fall from grace has only just begun!

name: grimstroke_rival_35
text: This is what happens to one-trick ponies.
text_simple: this is what happens to onetrick ponies

name: grimstroke_rival_36

text_simple: even creatures of legend fall before my power

name: grimstroke_rival_39
text: You're about as smart as I'd expect a sentient rock to be...

name: grimstroke_rival_40

text_simple: did i just put you out of your misery

text_simple: at least you died with a smile on your face

text_simple: i take little pleasure in killing such a beautiful creature

name: grimstroke_rival_78

name: grimstroke_rival_80

name: grimstroke_rival_81
text: Your tale will live on, Donte, as a footnote in my legacy.

text: Your technique depends too much on luck, and too little on actual skill.

text: As I thought. Kill you, and your brothers fall.
